channel.title: Need Help
channel.description:

client.java:2770: ')' expected } while(class30_sub2_sub3.anInt1419 = 93 || !aClass42_Sub1_1068.method564(class3 0_Sub2_sub3.anInt1421, -520); ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“dambi96, post:1, topic:313553”]i need help i am addin the gs anim thing by cjsilent but i get this error in client.java

[quote]client.java:2770: ‘)’ expected
} while(class30_sub2_sub3.anInt1419 = 93 || !aClass42_Sub1_1068.method564(class3
0_Sub2_sub3.anInt1421, -520);

                        ^

1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]
need help[/quote]

You need an extra bracket, instead of what you have which is:

} while(class30_sub2_sub3.anInt1419 = 93 || !aClass42_Sub1_1068.method564(class3 0_Sub2_sub3.anInt1421, -520);

You’d add this:

} while(class30_sub2_sub3.anInt1419 = 93 || !aClass42_Sub1_1068.method564(class3 0_Sub2_sub3.anInt1421, -520));

Read full topic
